subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic has had to cope with the death of his childhood coach and touchstone Jelena Gencic in the midst of the event he now wants to win more than any other.
snippet: Novak Djokovic has had to cope with the death of his childhood coach and touchstone Jelena Gencic in the midst of the event he now wants to win more than any other.
